name: bountygraph-monorepo
description: BountyGraph - On-chain proof-of-work receipts and dependency graphs

scripts.test:anchor: TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.json npx mocha tests/bountygraph.test.js --require ts-node/register --timeout 60000
scripts.test:api: TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 TS_NODE_PROJECT=api/tsconfig.json npx mocha api/tests/**/*.test.js --require ts-node/register --timeout 30000
scripts.test:all: npm run test:anchor && npm run test:api
scripts.ci: npm run test:all && npm run build

author: neogenuity
